Interface SmppServerSimulator<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of received messages
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloudhopperSMPPServer, JSMPPServer

    public interface SmppServerSimulator<M>
    Abstraction to wrap any SMPP server
